snippet: At the end of a four-day visit, a human rights official said “mass atrocities” had been committed, with reports of killings and sexual violence.
abstract: Ivan Simonovic, top United Nations human rights official visiting South Sudan, says mass atrocities have been committed by both sides as fighters loyal to Pres Salva Kiir battle forces aligned with his ousted rival former Vice Pres Riek Machar.
lead_paragraph: At the end of a four-day visit, a human rights official said “mass atrocities” had been committed, with reports of killings and sexual violence.
